sentences.english: What women are looking for pecks and a cute butt.
sentences.chinese: 女人想要的是發達的胸肌和漂亮的臀部。

sentences.english: You may be able to do these things if you build a big chest.
sentences.chinese: 或許當你練出了強大的胸肌後你就能辦到了。

sentences.english: The dumbbell fly is a boxing exercise that strengthens the pectoral muscles and improves endurance.
sentences.chinese: 啞鈴飛是一個拳擊運動的加強和提高耐力胸肌。

sentences.english: They noted a better muscular development in the rotator muscles of the shoulders and the pectoralis major.
sentences.chinese: 表明肩部的迴旋肌和大胸肌發育更好。

sentences.english: This will allow you to place even more stress on your inner chest.
sentences.chinese: 這會使你將更大的壓力加在內部胸肌上。

sentences.english: B:I'm going to work on my chest and triceps.
sentences.chinese: 我打算練一下胸肌和三頭肌。

sentences.english: But the development of breast muscle of Peking duck has two characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 傳統北京鴨存在胸肌率低，胸肌發育較晚的特點。

sentences.english: But the development of breast muscle of Peking duck has two characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 傳統北京鴨存在胸肌率低，胸肌發育較晚的特點。

sentences.english: When it comes to the chest, you can't go wrong with the push-ups.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要練胸肌，多作些伏地挺身就絕不會錯了。

sentences.english: This exercise develops literally every tract of the pectoral muscle, but requires some proper warm up.
sentences.chinese: 這個練習幾乎鍛鍊所有各部分胸肌，但事先需要熱身。

sentences.english: I went to the beach, and I couldn't stop staring at the hot guys' pecs .
sentences.chinese: 我到海灘上總免不了要盯着看健美男士的胸肌。

sentences.english: Her chest muscles jerked, trying to breathe.
sentences.chinese: 她一試圖呼吸她的胸肌便抽蓄不止。

sentences.english: Don't you want a washboard stomach and rock-hard pecs?
sentences.chinese: 你不想擁有平滑的小腹和結實的胸肌嗎？

sentences.english: Slouching or rolling your shoulders forward shortens your chest muscles and reduces their flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 肩膀低垂或是內旋會使胸肌縮短並且彈性降低。

sentences.english: Eric put on a tight vest and showed off his muscular chest and firm arms.
sentences.chinese: 換上緊身背心的孫耀威，盡騷發達胸肌及結實手臂。

sentences.english: The bench press is considered the single most effective exercise for those seeking to build a big chest.
sentences.chinese: 臥推被認爲是練出大胸肌最有效的方法。

definition: pectoralis major muscle (across the top of the chest)
latissimus dorsi muscle (back of the chest)
triceps brachii (back of the upper arm)
trapezius muscle (of the upper back and neck)
serratus anterior muscle (upper sides of the chest)
